QuestData.Title: Hellscream's Vigil
QuestData.Description: Throm-Ka, $r! Welcome to Warsong Hold. My heart swells with pride to see that such a distinguished hero of the Horde has answered the call of duty!$B$BThis impregnable fortress is a testament to the tenacity of the Horde. Through much we have battled to establish this foothold in Northrend. It is from here that our journey to Icecrown begins and it is through the leadership of the son of Hellscream that we will succeed!$B$BGarrosh awaits your arrival below.$B$BLok'tar ogar!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Garrosh Hellscream in Warsong Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: Do not think that I have forgotten what you did for my people in Nagrand, $n. Hellscream never forgets.$b$bFor that I am indebted to you and it is why I give you this chance now: run. Leave this place and never look back.$b$bReturn to your home and say a prayer for the dying.
